Home » 40P8 Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
58 Bhāvanāyapahātabbaduka
Bhāvanāyapahātabbaduka
77.
246Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
247Nanabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
248Nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
249Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve…pe…  avigate pañca.
